summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Brown & Blonde Highlight Tape in Human Hair Extensions Long Straight Seamless Skin Weft Hair Invisible Double Sided Tape 20pcs 30g+10pcs Extra Tapes Medium Brown mixed Dark Blonde #4-27 18inch
Review Date: 2020/05/27
Store: Benehair
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Benehair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 7 x 0.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '765951854224'}
Review Text: The hair is really itchy. It does not feel like human hair. Gave me a horrible rash on my face and neck
Review Title: Not human
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Umillars 384pc Matte Pure Color Coffin False Nails Artificial Fake nails Full Cover Fingernails 16 Colors & 12 Sizes Nail Tips Kit with One Crystal Nail File for Nail Art Salon DIY Decoration
Review Date: 2020/10/28
Store: Umillars
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Size': '385 Piece Set', 'Material': 'crystal', 'Brand': 'Umillars', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 3 x 3 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: There thin so I double them up. Add clear coat gel polish and they don’t chip or fade. Lastss up to 2 weeks for me once the top coat is added. Great deal and lost of pretty colors to choose from.
Review Title: Great price
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cute Fairy Tape In Human Hair Extensions Full Cuticle Seamless Straight Tape Hair Extensions 40g 20Pcs/Pac Dark Brown Highlight with Caramel Blonde Hair Extensions Human Hair 20 inches
Review Date: 2020/12/21
Store: cute fairy
Average Rating: 1.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cute fairy', 'Color': 'Brown, Caramel blonde', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 3.5 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '791261180159'}
Review Text: I ordered 5 bundles and they only sent 4. Then when I mentioned it they refunded me for one instead of sending it. The hair also arrived several days after it was supposed to. I waited until I had the hair installed for at least 2 weeks before leaving this review. The hair is super thin. It thankfully feels thicker once you wash it but I have only washed it twice and it’s already a horrible mess. I don’t use heat on it AT ALL!!! I have slept with it in braids on a silk pillow case since day one.I only use hair extensions approved shampoo and conditioner as well as special leave in oils for moisture. It feels more like heat safe synthetic than human hair.  In my opinion it is not worth the.money at all. The only good thing about the hair is that the tapes have held up beautifully. Other than that I would say a big No to purchasing again. I would return them if I could. Very disappointed. Now I have to celebrate Christmas with a ratty nest on my head because my hair dresser is out of town until after New Years. Save your troubles and money. Go with a different brand.
Review Title: Don’t do it. I want my money back :(
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SEGO Nano Ring Hair Extensions Human Hair Balayage Nano Beads Pre-bonded Seamless Hairpieces Loop Hand Tied Nano Tip Remy Hair Highlight Hair for Women 1g/strand 50g/pack -24 Inch -2 Dark Brown
Review Date: 2022/01/08
Store: SEGO
Average Rating: 2.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SEGO', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '13.5 x 7.68 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
Review Text: It’s hard to see from the photo but the hair after 1 wash keeps getting matted underneath really bad. I followed all care instructors correctly. I can brush them out and they will be ok for a half hour or so and then right back to tangled and matted. Disappointed. I bought 5 bundles and spent a lot of money. So itchy too. Ugh. I need to stop buying cheaper hair.also very thin. Second Photo is the ends of 5 bundles installed. Very thin ends.
Review Title: Bad quality after first wash
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Anihiho Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair Straight Hair Extensions Tape in Real Human Hair Tape in Hair Extensions for Women (14 Inch 30g , Jet Black)
Review Date: 2022/04/11
Store: Anihiho
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anihiho', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Package Dimensions': '6.97 x 4.69 x 0.63 inches; 2.08 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have been wearing tape extensions for years. I have tried so many brands on Amazon and eBay and up until now, have never been satisfied. I have had these installed for 2 weeks and I must say, the hair is amazing. I have washed it and it still feels so good. It doesn’t tangle at all so far. It’s not itchy either. And the color matches my hair perfectly. My only issue I have had so far is the tapes are horrible. I had them professionally installed and after 4 days I went to wash my hair and as soon as my hair was soaked they all started sliding out. I hadn’t even used any product yet. The tapes basically Disintegrated because there wasn’t even any residue left in my hair. I have never had that happen before. So you might want to retape before applying them. I retaped them and put them back in and have had no issues thus far. Definitely recommend them. The tapes may suck but the hair is amazing. I will only order from this brand from now on.
Review Title: Best extensions on Amazon but tapes suck
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: HAIRCUBE Long Straight Blonde Wigs for Women Ombre Wigs Mid-partition Heat Resistance Synthetic Hair Natural Looking for Daily Party Use(Ash Blonde)
Review Date: 2022/04/17
Store: HAIRCUBE
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'HAIRCUBE', 'Package Dimensions': '10.91 x 8.54 x 2.01 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LC462'}
Review Text: This wig isn’t the worst i have had but its also not the best. Don’t get me wrong it will work good for cosplay or dress up fun but I can’t see myself using it outside of the house. The wig is unrealistic at the roots and front and it feels similar to costume wigs for Halloween. It is pretty but you can get better synthetic wigs on amazon.
Review Title: It’s ok for coslay or dress u, not so much for daily use
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glitter Eyeliner Liquid, Liquid Eyeliner Colorful Set, 10 Colors Liquid Glitter Eyeliner, Glitter Liquid Eyeshadow Set, Shimmer Sparkling Neon Eye liners for Women, Glitter Eyeliner Pencil
Review Date: 2022/06/06
Store: Reddhoon
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 3.86 x 0.67 inches; 4.66 Ounces'}
Review Text: These are really fun to play around with and use but you do have to do a few layers to get the look. They don’t smell weird but my eyelids did get a little itchy afterwards.
Review Title: Fun the use but really have to layer it on
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Title: Good synthetic wig

raw_response:
**Preferences and Trends Summary:**

- **Hair Extensions**: The individual shows a strong interest in hair extensions, particularly tape-in and human hair options. They have purchased multiple brands, often expressing dissatisfaction with the quality, such as itchiness and thinness. They seem drawn to various colors, including brown and blonde variations.  

- **Nail Products**: They appreciate artificial nails, favoring options with numerous colors and sizes. Positive feedback indicates they prioritize durability and aesthetic appeal in nail products.

- **Wigs**: The user has bought synthetic wigs and has mixed feelings about their realism and usability, indicating a preference for styles suited for specific occasions like cosplay, rather than daily wear.

- **Beauty Products**: The individual has been experimenting with eyeliners, specifically glitter options, and shows enjoyment for playful makeup, though they note application challenges. 

- **Skin Care**: An inclination towards vegan skin care is evident, as the buyer repeatedly chooses products with vegan ingredients, highlighting a preference for hypoallergenic and non-irritating formulations. 

Overall, the buyer is focused on beauty and hair enhancement products, favoring human hair and vegan options while being critical of quality and functionality across their purchases.

target_interaction.title: Feels nice
target_interaction.text: The hair feels nice and it doesn’t have a weird smell. There’s forklifts so it stays in place. I’ve lost all a lot of my hair due to illness and ended up having to shave my head back in June and now that my hair is long enough to attach extensions I want to have long hair again but unfortunately, because my hair is only a few inches long, you can see the extensions and wearing this topper hide them.
target_interaction.title_meta: Hairro Human Hair Toppers for Women, 12 Inch Remy Clip in Hair Piece, 130% Density 3.2x4.7 Silk Base for Parting, Virgin Human Hair Wigs for Thinning Hair/Hair Loss/Grey Hair #2 Darkest Brown

videos.title: Wear the topper with middle part hair.
How to wear a hair topper for middle part hair
